statements: DELETE FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_id = 100 AND user_id = 50;
DELETE FROM transaction_logs WHERE operation = 'DELETE' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM transaction_logs WHERE id = 100 AND user_id = 500
DELETE FROM audit_trails WHERE event_type = 'login' AND log_id IN (SELECT id FROM transaction_logs WHERE amount > 100)
DELETE FROM TransactionLog WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND product_id = 500;
DELETE FROM AuditTrail WHERE user_id = 200 AND action = 'update';
DELETE FROM order_details WHERE order_id = '54321' AND product_id = '67890';
DELETE FROM orders WHERE user_id = 100 AND product_id = 50;
DELETE FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = 100 AND transaction_type = 'withdrawal';
